title: Juno and the Paycock
overview: In the slums of Dublin during the Irish Civil War, the Boyle familyâ€™s fragile stability collapses after news of an unexpected inheritance lures them into a false sense of prosperity. Captain Boyle, a boastful idler, squanders their meager resources, while his wife Juno holds the household together. When the fortune proves illusory, the family faces ruin, betrayal, and tragedy.
